title: まぁまぁ
body:
お買い得だったので購入。
思ったより大きいですが使い勝手は良いです。
底に溜まった残りのコーヒーと豆は捨てるのでこの700ccくらいで丁度500ccくらい飲める感じなのでこのサイズでよかったです。
ただ初めはペーパーに比べると雑味が気になってました。

湯を注いで数分待ってプレスしてそれから直ぐカップinせず再度4〜5分置いてプレス後の豆の塵のようなモヤモヤ(豆はフレンチプレス用に粗めに挽いてます)したのが沈澱した頃カップinして飲んでます。
最近はこれに飲み慣れたせいかペーパーは使用しなくなりました。

title: 綺麗ですが
body:
評価訂正:写真の変形した台形は注ぎ口の位置を示す印の様です。この蓋の印と注ぎ口を合わせないと注ぐ時漏れてしまいます。印と合わせれば大丈夫でした。それでこの変形した台形のマークは手作りの愛らしさと思うことにしました。

肝心の味はとてもいいです。コーヒーの豆からのオイルも出てコクがありいつもの豆がとても美味しいです。

以前のレビュー:
キッチンが片付いたら使おうと思って、いざ使おうとしたら蓋に奇妙なシミ(？)。矢印でも書いてあるのかなと思ってそのままにしていたのですが、よく見ると矢印ではなく変形した模様のシミです。歳のせいか見落としました。拭いても取れません。返品の期間が過ぎているので、このまま使うしかないのかと思うととても残念です。

title: Two for French Press Coffee
body: I bought this French Press Coffee Maker to make a cuppa for two as I did not wish to use my 12 cup percolator which makes a minimum of four cups. As I did not know much about the French Press Coffee Maker when it arrived I thought I had not received all the parts. The instruction sheet that came with it was for the Glass French Press Coffee Maker which showed that I was supposed to receive several strainers which weren’t there. I contacted Amazon Australia but I was told, much to my disappointment, that they couldn’t send me any strainers that I explained were missing. Later that evening I noticed on the instruction sheet the Easyworkz email address to which I immediately sent an email. I wish to thank Easyworkz for their wonderful assistance. After explaining the problem, I was asked to send them a photograph of what I had received and they said that they would help me. They quickly emailed me, indicating that the parts were there but that they had been already assembled and all I had to do was to twist the end to come apart and all the strainers would be there. As I said I knew very little about the French Press Coffee Maker so I was extremely happy when I found that the pieces were not missing but were all there just as they said because I really liked the Easyworkz French Press Coffee Maker. I am very pleased to have it as it makes lovely coffee and the double insulated walls of the Coffee Maker keeps the coffee warm. So a very big thank you to Easyworkz for their great after sales service.
author: Clare Rose
date: Revisado en Australia el 2 de junio de 2023

title: Blemish or Real?
body: I have not yet used this item. I planned to wash it before using as a precaution from packing/shipping. I examined the product prior to washing and noticed a strange looking mark on the lid that appears to be a blemish in/on the surface. I contacted Easyworkz and was informed the mark is intentional and designed to indicate the center of the pouring direction. Maybe my eyes are deceiving me (?) but the blemish is quite off center from the pouring direction, still appears to be a blemish. The one side of the mark is jagged compared to the other three sides, so maybe it is a defect from manufacturing? Further conversation with the seller led to them providing an example of the intended mark similar to the mark I see on the lid, though with very sharp/crisp lines, and explained that it is intended to look like water pouring. Easyworkz did not offer any actual assistance, only defensive rationalization for the strange mark in the lid. Maybe it really is supposed to look like that, or maybe it is actually a blemish.

title: Great coffee pot
body:
Fed up of my husband smashing my glass pots, I went in search of an indistinguishable one, that keeps
coffee hot for longer and produces less sediment and so far, this meets the standard.

After the 1st few pots of coffee, I was disappointed to find a lot of sediment remaining in my morning cuppa, however after a closer look, the sieve was folded over around the edge. After taking it apart, hammering to flatten and fiddling about with it, I'm please to report, I now have coffee with much less sediment in it.

The coffee is definitely hotter out of this pot than my previous glass pots, but how long it stays like this for, I cannot say, because it never lasts long enough for me to find out!! Although the handle and outside wall does get warm, it never gets too hot to handle.

Pours well, and the lid can also be rotated to keep the heat from escaping.

Love the fact that it's dishwasher safe and it comes out looking like new, and if it's important to you, it will also look good on any breakfast or dinner table.

Overall a great coffee pot, so 5* from me, however, quality control needs to up their game!

title: Nice French Press for the Money
body:
I really liked this French Press when I got it. The 23 oz. size was just what I wanted, but after only three months the screw on the plunger that holds the filter screen started loosening and keeps coming apart so that the whole thing comes loose and falls off of its own accord - sometimes when I'm plunging. I'm continually tightening it but it won't stay.

After leaving my three star review, Easyworkz contacted me and sent me another plunger rod with screen and plates. I think this was really great customer service and I appreciate what they did. It took a long time to come though, and in the meantime I did a lot of research on French Presses and kept coming across Frieling. They are very pricey, but I found one for a good price and bought it. I was skeptical that a French press could really be that good, worth that much money, and make such a difference. Well, it is and it does. It has a double screen filter that really keeps the grounds and fines out, and a patented design on the plate above the screens that has a wire going around inside the coil that keeps it tight when plunging. The coffee is really excellent. In fact, I liked the 23 ounce one so much, I went and hunted down a good deal on the 44 ounce one, too. Having said that, I still like the Easyworkz press. It looks great and makes a decent cup of coffee or brewed cacao for the money. And the company gets five stars for customer service.
author: JanW
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 30 de octubre de 2022

title: Formschön und funktionell.

title: Great French Press
body: I really like using this. It is so pretty. It works very well. It has a strong filtration system so you get a very small amount of sediment.
author: Calif Techie
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 17 de octubre de 2022

title: Stylish and functional!
body: Sturdy little stainless steel coffee plunger (350ml) which makes two espresso size or one large teacup size coffee. Perfect travel companion for remote workers that loves their coffee. Keeps the coffee hot longer than glass. Enjoying this product.
author: Jill
date: Revisado en Australia el 13 de octubre de 2022

title: Delighted!
body:
This was a replacement for a similar coffee pot we've had for years. The problem with the old one was one of the rings at the business end of the plunger was silicone and stretched out of shape over time.
All the components in this pot are stainless steel so this can't happen. It's very sturdy and easy to clean.
These insulated coffee pots are, easy to plunge, keep the keep the coffee hot for ages and look great too.
author: Brian M.
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 8 de octubre de 2022

title: Elegant Coffee
body: Just a nice shape for bringing to the dinner table. So much nicer than the boring, cylindrical pots. Does it keep coffee hot? No idea, as it gets finished before we can test that.
author: Mycroft
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 6 de octubre de 2022

title: Great screening ability
body: I had a cheap Ikea French Press that always left too much coffee sludge in the bottom of my mug. This French press is great! Excellent screen! It is cuter in person. Would buy again and give as a gift.
author: C Evans
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 5 de octubre de 2022

title: So happy with my new coffee plunger
body: Brand new coffee plunger-got it in a day!!!! So happy with it and lovely look. Very delicious flavour and aroma 🤩🤩🤩
author: Jazmin Doyle
date: Revisado en Australia el 30 de septiembre de 2022

title: BEST EVER
body:
I love everything about it. Quality stainless steel. Mirror finish. Extra filtration. Top that has an open and closed position. WELL INSULATED INCLUDING THE HANDLE.
•Having the coffee hotter than the milk is critical if you layer lattes.
NOTE: The picture is to show how I layer lattes. The coffee press is not in the photo.

SHAPE is important to me —all my pots are "pot-bellied" stainless steel —this made a perfect match!!
Delivered either same day or next day free shipping. I may order another.
I recommend this product 100%!!
author: Kemble W. Scatchard
date: Revisado en Canadá el 25 de septiembre de 2022

title: Bonne qualité - Excellent rapport qualité/prix
body: Cette cafetière semble solide. Le bouton poussoir est en métal massif. Un détail important s'agissant d'une pièce particulièrement sollicitée. Cette cafetière est parfaitement fonctionnelle. Aucun résidu de café. Facile à nettoyer à l'intérieur comme à l'extérieur. Un article bien pensé et de bonne qualité.
author: Client d'Amazon
date: Revisado en Francia el 22 de septiembre de 2022

title: Brilliant!
body: Brilliant product - use it every day.
author: James Trigg
date: Revisado en Australia el 18 de septiembre de 2022

title: Sehr praktisch und optisch gut
body: Optisch ansprechend, wir sind tatsächlich wirklich begeistert vom Geschmack des Kaffee's. Wir nutzen die Kaffeekanne im Wohnmobil sehr praktisch!
author: Jörg Alsleben
date: Revisado en Alemania el 11 de septiembre de 2022

title: VERSATILIDAD
body: Te sirve tanto para preparar café como para preparar té, y te lo conserva caliente durante un tiempo de hasta 5h. La única pega que le pongo es que para lavar los filtros se hace complicado porque el bombín de la parte superior se suelta al hacer fuerza para sacar los filtros y entonces te quedas sin soporte para desatornillar, al final tengo que terminar usando unos alicates.
author: Katherine
date: Revisado en España el 15 de febrero de 2023

title: ステンレス製にして良かった
body:
ガラス製を利用していて、破損。その代わりに購入。
少し重いが気に入っている。
以前よりコーヒーかすが残りにくくなった。
author: ミル大好き
date: Revisado en Japón el 12 de julio de 2024

title: Mein neues Kaffeelieblingsgadget
body: Lange Zeit habe ich mich dem French-Press-Hype entzogen, und mich dann doch ergeben. Und was soll ich sagen: gleich mit dem ersten Wurf dieses Schmuckstück bestellt und eine neue Art des Kaffeegenusses entdeckt. Dieses Teil ist der Wahnsinn: der Kaffee schmeckt lecker, er bleibt lange heiß und auf dem Tisch erfreut sich auch das Auge an diesem schicken Design. Mit einem Geschirrtuch, ganz einfach und schnell, lässt es sich immer wieder auf Hochglanz polieren. Die Reinigung ist auch kinderleicht. Absolute Kaufempfehlung.
author: dinamaus
date: Revisado en Alemania el 20 de julio de 2024

title: Mooi, maar helaas al stuk
body:
Prachtig potje, blijft mooi warm.
Helaas brak steeltje van filter af bij schroefdraad.
Improviseren en maar ff kijken.
author: Okkie
date: Revisado en Países Bajos el 14 de marzo de 2022

title: FINALLY!!!!
body: I tried so many different ones, high quality and low quality. But now this thing right here is, for me, Greatness!!! Finally a company who made a super high quality and well designed French Press for the love of Coffee. It's all steel, not a piece of plastic, and when you put the lid, it totally blocks the nozzle part so the heat remain inside for a long time. Since it's steel against steel, moving the filter up and down will sound like it should, not silent like glass, I don't mind at all. It's beautiful to stare at...now my toaster, my rice cooker, nothing in my kitchen look good anymore, except for this fabulous French Press. I drank my first coffee from it's belly not long ago and it was such a relief, my search is over. Thanks to those responsible for this creation.
author: MC
date: Revisado en Canadá el 12 de enero de 2022

title: Prensa fransesa
body: Chegou rápido bem embalado porém veio com defeito, e o defeito é de fabricacão não vé defeito de transporte
author: Dayane
date: Revisado en Brasil el 7 de julio de 2024

title: Bonita y buena
body: Hace bien el café, es hermética y trae su cucharita. Compre la de 700ml y es perfecta para 2 tazas.
author: María F.
date: Revisado en México el 11 de julio de 2022

title: Makes delicious coffee and keeps coffee warm……..
body: Love this new French press. I have about 5 differently sized glass French presses. Unfortunately, glass shatters if dropped in the sink. I’ve had many of these accidents and had to replace the glass which ended up costing a small fortune happening every so often. I was tired of replacing glass. I never considered this type of insulated French press. It’s stainless steel which makes a good cup of coffee. The insulated press is an added feature for me and never considered it, but to my surprise it keeps coffee warm for longer periods than the glass one. Just add hot water in the French press before making coffee for a minute or so and then pour it out and then add your coffee and and hot water. Additionally I add hot water to heat up my cup as well. Couldn’t be happier. It makes delicious coffee. It seems to be well constructed as well. I’m considering buying a larger one and getting rid of the glass ones.
author: Stella C.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 30 de marzo de 2022

title: Esta muy bonita y funcional.
body: Esta muy bien terminado todo en aluminio
author: Carlos A G
date: Revisado en México el 22 de noviembre de 2021

title: Schön anzusehen
body: Schöne kleine Kanne, jedoch mit 350ml zu klein. Ich dachte dass ich 1,5 Tassen bekomme, das war ein Irrtum. Hatte vorher 350ml abgemessen, ist aber etwas weniger. Kaffee ist sehr aromatisch, kein Kaffeesatz in der Tasse und wunderbar heiß. Werde diese jedoch verschenken und die nächst größere kaufen. Kleine scharfe Kante am Siebträger, jedoch für mich kein Problem da ich für kleines Geld ansonsten ein tolles Produkt erworben habe.
author: Amazon Kunde
date: Revisado en Alemania el 13 de julio de 2022

title: 傷は無かった
body: 先日送ったレビューで傷があったと書きましたが、しっかり擦ったら傷は消えました、良かった。

date: Revisado en Japón el 15 de julio de 2024

title: Looks great
body: It keeps my coffee hot for quite a while, so good for a second cup. Looks stylish too.
author: Dave W.
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 13 de junio de 2024

title: Coffee press
body: Love this !

date: Revisado en Canadá el 7 de julio de 2024

title: Excellent très bon rapport qualité/ prix
body: Très pratique avec son double filtre
author: Marianne
date: Revisado en Francia el 22 de febrero de 2022

title: Very good
body: Keeps coffee nice and warm - does 2 cups so if you need more go for the bigger one

date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 1 de junio de 2024

title: 初心者でも美味しいコーヒー
body: 保温性がありスマートなフォルムが気に入っています。淹れ方の説明書に添い4分待つと初心者の私でも美味しいコーヒーが頂けました。当たり前の事ですが使用後は細目にろ過フィルターや本体をキレイに保つように心がけています。
author: Amazon カスタマー
date: Revisado en Japón el 16 de junio de 2024

title: Works fine, but has some issues
body: Works fine as a French press should, main issue I have with the one I got is the seam on the inside at the spout has holes, like it wasn’t welded properly. Water gets into the space between the double walls and can’t come out. Not sure if this will cause sanitation issues down the line.
author: Mallory S.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 27 de mayo de 2024

title: Best yet!
body:
Bypass all other cafetieres. This one is it!!!
I can't believe I've wasted so many years on glass cafetieres with cheap plastic finishes (even those purchased from well know middle-class department stores). This cafetiere makes excellent coffee and it's both practical and stylish. No more ground coffee grinds in my cup. I'm so impressed, I'm going to invest in a larger pot for entertaining. Highly recommend.
author: DevonshireDancer
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 17 de julio de 2022

title: Looks great
body: Product arrived in great condition. Insulated carafe keeps coffee warm a little longer than regular press carafes. So far I am pleased. Would love this version with a grind basket, always a hassle cleaning grinds out of the bottom of a press. Definitely looks good on the dinner table!
author: T
date: Revisado en Canadá el 18 de julio de 2022

title: Really good
body: It is large enough to do me 2 mugs of coffee and keeps it warm nicely too. I've had no problem pouring my 2nd coffee 1/2 hour later as its still hot! I've also found it quite easy to clean as the filters are easy to unscrew, wash and then put together again.
author: Angela Simpson
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 7 de agosto de 2022

title: Nice Caffetiere.
body: This is a nice Cafetière but as it is supposed to be thermal it doesn’t keep the coffee hot for very long. Bit disappointed really.
author: Rosemary Thomas
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 12 de abril de 2022

title: Sleek design, decent price, wish it comes with more stainless steel filter than the plastic one
body:
It's sleek and decently priced. Retains heat pretty well. Much easier to clean than the stainless steel cone filter. Best serving for one person.

Something that I wish
1. One more layer of stainless steel filter instead of the plastic one. Additional filter would be great.
2. You can see the welding between the body and the handle part. It's not too much an eyesore.
author: Carol Braun
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 27 de marzo de 2021

title: Très déçue je veux un remboursement
body: Cette cafetière laisse toujours passer plein de grains de café. Cette photo est prise après que j'aie passé 5mn à en enlever un max. Et ceci pendant plusieurs jours, ce n'est pas juste la 1er utilisation. Je suis une habituée des cafetiéres presses, et même ceux à 18$ marchent bcp mieux. Je voudrais être remboursée svp, je me sens flouée à ce point.
author: Cathy
date: Revisado en Canadá el 12 de mayo de 2022

title: Defects!!!
body: The product has defects that you can see on the pictures. I need it for this weekend so it is impossible to return it. I am sure it will end up in metal rusting. Not satisfied at all!
author: radoslaw
date: Revisado en Alemania el 28 de abril de 2022

title: Schöne Frech Press Kaffeekanne mit Beschädigung und nicht verarbeitet.
body: Lieferung war unpersönlich und der Innen Karton war eingedrückt, konnte man durch Amazon Tüte nicht erkennen. Schade...
author: Kiwi Canterbury
date: Revisado en Alemania el 10 de agosto de 2022

title: 安かろう悪かろうの典型ですね
body:
蓋ががたつきます。
保温性に関してはお湯を注いで4分たつ頃には外側が温かくなっています(熱くはなっていないです)。そもそも長時間保存するものでもないので構わないですが保温性は低いでしょう。
フィルターもパッキンがないので全然微分がでてきます。まあこれもフレンチプレスならそんなものかと言う感じです。

じゃあなにが問題かと言うと、保温性もなく微分も入りやすいのに、中が見えないためフィルターをどのくらい下げたら良いのか、どのくらいまでコーヒーを淹れたら微分がでてくるかの確認ができないことです。
この性能であればもっと安価でもガラス性のものの方が使い勝手が良いと思います。
味は、良い豆を使って豆と水と温度と時間をしっかり計ればすごく美味しいコーヒーが淹れられます。(これじゃなくても)
author: 小暮
date: Revisado en Japón el 27 de agosto de 2022

title: Tiny!
body: You can barely make a mug of coffee with this. Returned it as When you pour the coffee out it dribbles all over. As the lid is part of the press system you have to leave that closed. Impossible to pour coffee without getting it all over the counter.
author: C Lawson
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 25 de abril de 2022

title: Kanne wird von außen heiß
body: Kanne wird von außen heiß und Getränk wird von innen nach relativ kurzer Zeit kalt
author: Eve
date: Revisado en Alemania el 25 de febrero de 2022

title: Stylish But Doesn't Keep Coffee Hot for Long
body:
This is a nice, stylish, adorable pot.
Nicely made.

I only gave it 3 stars because it doesn't keep coffee as warm as I hoped it would. This is more for serving. It will keep coffee warmer than in a cup on a cold day, but it will only stay warm for about 20 mins. Time goes fast when you're working and then your coffee is cold.

It's small. It only holds about 1-1/2 cups of coffee. I would only recommend buying it to serve coffee to guests not to keep coffee hot.
author: Kat M.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 5 de diciembre de 2020

title: いまいち。
body: 姿が美しい。注ぎ口が、いまいち。
author: 井上忠雄
date: Revisado en Japón el 9 de septiembre de 2022

title: Beauty, But Too Small!
body: I loved everything about the pot, but I didn't realize how small it is... I had to return it and haven't gotten around to finding one in the next size up. Maybe someone will gift me one for Christmas?
author: Marilyn Hicks
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 1 de julio de 2022

title: Keeps It Hot
body: Bought this because my previous press wouldn't keep my coffee hot for longer than maybe 30 minutes. This pot keeps it piping hot for up to 2 hours which is plenty of time for me to get through my morning internet browsing. My previous pot also allowed the "silt" from the grounds to pour into my cup making that last swallow rather nasty. This pot eliminates that problem as well. Glad I bought it!
author: Claycat52
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 25 de noviembre de 2020

title: Excellent Quality!
body: I was very impressed with the quality of this French Press! My glass french press cracked, so I was in the market for a new one and I loved this design. I'm so glad I chose this one! It insulates very well and is much easier to clean than my glass one was. I'm sure this will last a very long time!

title: Great French Press
body: I love this French Press, I've had it for months & use it everyday. I just can't find replacement screens for this size.
